tool_description: We are a freemium service, we offer a free rate limited API to search database leaks.
name: Astral Database Engine
title: Astral Database Engine

api_list.name: Updates
api_list.description: Get the latest updates on our service
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://astral-database-engine.p.rapidapi.com/api/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "astral-database-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
